snippet: The Americans Elana Meyers Taylor and Cherrelle Garrett won a women’s bobsled race in Altenberg, Germany, for their third straight World Cup victory.
abstract: Elana Meyers Taylor and Cherrelle Garrett win women's World Cup bobsled race in Germany; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Americans Elana Meyers Taylor and Cherrelle Garrett won a women’s bobsled race in Altenberg, Germany, for their third straight World Cup victory.
